憋.definition: to choke; to stifle; to restrain; to hold back; to hold in (urine); to hold (one's breath)

憋不住.definition: to be unable to repress sth; to be unable to contain oneself

憋尿.definition: to hold in one's pee; to hold back from urinating

憋悶.definition: to feel oppressed; to be depressed; to feel dejected

憋氣.definition: to hold one's breath; to feel suffocated (for lack of air); choked with bottled-up resentment
